name: cypress-bdd-automation-framework
description: This repository contains a **Cypress**-based **Behavior-Driven Development (BDD) automation framework** designed for testing web applications. The framework utilizes **Cypress** for fast and reliable testing, along with **Cucumber** for writing human-readable **Gherkin** scenarios, promoting collaboration between developers, testers, and business stakeholders.

scripts.test:all: npm run test && npm run e2e
